{{Wired embedded system |brand=Netgear |model=ProSecure |revision=UTM150 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |est_release_date=06/2011 |type=Router Firewall, router, firewall |pwr_v=100-240 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=C13 |pwr_ac_hz=50/60 |cpu1_brand=Cavium |cpu1_model=CN5230 |cpu1_cspeed=750 |cpu1_cores=4 |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX29GL640EHT2I-70G |fla2=2 GiB |fla2_brand=Apacer |fla2_model=CompactFlash III |ram1=1 GiB |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=M470T2864EH3-CF7 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag=yes,, 14-pin header,, unpopulated,, J4 |serial=yes,, console,, DE-9,, (9600 8N1) |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Broadcom |eth_chip2_model=BCM54616S |eth_chip3_brand=Broadcom |eth_chip3_model=BCM54616S |sw_brand=Broadcom |sw_model=BCM53115 |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=4 |wan_speed=1GbE |wan_ports=4 |addl_chips= I²C Serial Real-Time Clock;Maxim;DS1337;;1;,,, PLL-based Clock Generator;IDT;ICS30S07AIL;;1;,,, In-System Programmable PLD;Lattice Semi;LC4064ZE;;1;,,, Low Skew 1 to 4 Clock Buffer;Integrated Device Technology;ICS651;;1;,,, High Speed 2-channel RS232/V.28 Interface;Analog Devices;ADM3202;;1;,,, 5V/12V Synchronous Buck PWM DC/DC Controller;Richtek;RT9214;;6;,,, 30V, 11A N-Channel Enhanced MOSFET;ANPEC Electronics;APM4820;;4;,,, 30V, 8A Dual N-Channel Enhanced MOSFET;ANPEC Electronics;APM7334;;3;,,, 25V, 55A N-Channel Enhanced MOSFET;Alpha & Omega Semiconductor;AOD452;;2;,,, 560mA Low-Dropout Fixed Voltage Regulator;ANPEC Electronics;APL5508;;1;,,, 3A Bus Termination Regulator;Richtek;RT9173;;1; |flags=CompactFlash card, RTC w/ battery backup, fan, heatsink, metal case, |stock_boot=U-Boot;1.1.1;Development build; |stock_os=Linux |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=password |oui_eth=74:44:01, }} {{TagLine|ProSecure Unified Threat Management (UTM) Appliance}} :{{SupportPage|vendor=NETGEAR|model=UTM150}}
===Specifications=== *Processor: [[Cavium]] ''Octeon Plus'' CN5230 :@750MHz Quad-core [[MIPS]]64 CPU *Flash/RAM: 8MB (SPI NOR)/1GB (DDR2) *CompactFlash Card: 2GB recognized as ''ide0'' in U-Boot * 4x GbE LAN ports, 4x GbE WAN ports * 1x USB 2.0 port
===See also=== :;[[Netgear ProSecure series]] *[[Netgear ProSecure UTM110]] • (495$) *[[Netgear ProSecure UTM150]] • [https://www.storagereview.com/review/netgear-prosecure-utm150-review Review on '''Storagereview'''] :CPU: [[Cavium]] CN5230 @750MHz ''OCTEON Plus'' (Quad Core) :Flash/RAM: 2GB/1GB, WAN/LAN: 4x/4x GbE (RJ45), 1x USB ports *[[ITUS Networks Shield]] • [https://openwrt.org/toh/itus_networks/itus_networks_shield ''Itus Networks Shield'' on '''OpenWrt''' wiki] *[[ITUS Networks Shield Pro]]
